title: A gentleman's invitation
content:
Hi.

Someone told me you were looking for a poker table around the corner.
Look no further, I can put you in touch with a dealer starting today.
I will charge you $500 for the service, but this small entry fee is nothing compared to the thousands, or even tens of thousands, you will make at this table.
Please answer on short notice, as the chair will not remain vacant forever.

Your middleman

title: Help out a soldier wife in mourning.
content:
Hi, this is Maria.

Not so long ago my husband Rick, along with his best friend, went on a mission on foreign ground to help secure our borders.
This is the kind of mission my husband enrolled for. Fighting for his country, for his fellow citizens. For our security, and the chance to give everyone the freedom they deserve.

My husband have been on similar missions countless times, showing immense courage, unshakable morale and ruthless determination to the face of the ennemy. And he would always return with a gift for our two children and me.

But not this time.
This time, no gifts were to be found.
This time, he have not returned.

All I ask is a little financial support to help me pay for a funeral up to my husband war effort and contribution to our country's safety.
I am proud to be his wife, even in these darker times.

If you want to contribute to a hero's funeral, you can contribute by sending some money on my PayPool account:
mourning.maria@paypool.com

Sincerly, Maria

title: Samantha feels alone tonight...
